name: Linkparser
tagline: Locate and extract almost any URL within a string. Handles protocol-less domains, IPv4 and IPv6, unrecognised TLDs, and more.
body:
LinkParser
==========

Locate and extract almost any URL within a string. Handles protocol-less domains, IPv4 and IPv6, unrecognised TLDs, and more.

`<script src="LinkParser.js"></script>
<script>var links = LinkParser.parse(text);</script>`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
